# Reading tidy data

```{r echo=FALSE}


data.EU.1990 <- read.csv("Output_EU_1990.csv")
data.EU.2010 <- read.csv("Output_EU_2010.csv")
data.ROW.1990 <- read.csv("Output_ROW_1990.csv")
data.ROW.2010 <- read.csv("Output_ROW_2010.csv")

head(data.EU.1990)
head(data.EU.2010)
head(data.ROW.1990)
head(data.ROW.2010)

attach(data.EU.1990)
attach(data.EU.2010)
attach(data.ROW.1990)
attach(data.ROW.2010)

df.EU.1990 <- data.frame(country=data.EU.1990$country, le=data.EU.1990$le, hale=data.EU.1990$hale, yld=data.EU.1990$yld, the=data.EU.1990$the)

df.EU.2010 <- data.frame(country=data.EU.2010$country, le=data.EU.2010$le,hale=data.EU.2010$hale, yld=data.EU.2010$yld, the=data.EU.2010$the)

df.ROW.1990 <- data.frame(country=data.ROW.1990$country, le=data.ROW.1990$le,hale=data.ROW.1990$hale, yld=data.ROW.1990$yld, the=data.ROW.1990$the)

df.ROW.2010 <- data.frame(country=data.ROW.2010$country, le=data.ROW.2010$le,hale=data.ROW.2010$hale, yld=data.ROW.2010$yld, the=data.ROW.2010$the)

df.EU.1990
df.EU.2010
df.ROW.1990
df.ROW.2010

ID.ROW.1 <- "JPN"
ID.ROW.2 <- "USA"

# Constant Scale in Graphs

lim.le <- c(65, 85)
lim.yld <- c(4, 15)
lim.hale <- c(30, 75)
lim.the <- c(100, 8500)

```



# Expansion of Morbidity WORLD: 1990-2010

```{r}
par(mar=c(5, 4, 4, 5) + 0.1)

plot(df.ROW.1990$hale, df.ROW.1990$yld, xlab="Health Adjusted Life Expectancy at Birth (hale)", ylab="Years Lived with Disease (YLD)", type="p", col="grey", pch = 16, cex = 1.3, lty = "solid", lwd = 2, xlim=lim.hale, ylim=lim.yld, axes=FALSE, frame.plot=FALSE)

points(df.ROW.2010$hale, df.ROW.2010$yld, col="darkslategrey", pch = 16, cex = 1.3, lty = "solid", lwd = 2)


points(df.EU.1990$hale, df.EU.1990$yld, col="blue", pch = 16, cex = 1.3, lty = "solid", lwd = 2)

points(df.EU.2010$hale, df.EU.2010$yld,  col="red", pch = 16, cex = 1.3, lty = "solid", lwd = 2)

points(df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], col="black", pch = 8, cex = 1.3, lty = "solid", lwd = 2)

axis(1, at=c(round(min(df.EU.1990$hale), 1), round(median(df.EU.1990$hale), 1), round(max(df.EU.1990$hale), 1)), col.axis="blue", col="blue", las=2, cex.axis=0.7,  tick=-.01)

axis(3, at=round(df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], 2), col.axis="black", col="black", las=2, cex.axis=0.7,  tick=-.01)

axis(2, at=c(round(min(df.EU.1990$yld), 1), round(median(df.EU.1990$yld), 1), round(max(df.EU.1990$yld), 1)), col.axis="blue", col="blue",las=2, cex.axis=0.7, tick=-.01)

axis(4, at=round(df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], 2), col.axis="black", col="black", las=2, cex.axis=0.7,  tick=-.01)

axis(3, at=c(round(min(df.EU.2010$hale), 1), round(median(df.EU.2010$hale), 1), round(max(df.EU.2010$hale), 1)), col.axis="red", col="red",las=2, cex.axis=0.7,  tick=-.01)

axis(4, at=c(round(min(df.EU.2010$yld), 1), round(median(df.EU.2010$yld), 1), round(max(df.EU.2010$yld), 1)), col.axis="red", col="red", las=2, cex.axis=0.7, tick=-.01)

legend(30, 15, c("EU 1990","EU 2010","ROW 1990", "ROW 2010"), col=c("blue", "red", "grey", "darkslategrey"), bty="n", y.intersp=1.5, pch=c(16,16,16,16), cex = 1)


text(df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1]+.3, labels=paste(ID.ROW.1, ""), cex= .8, pos=4, offset = .2)

abline(h=df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], v=df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], lty=1, lwd=1)

ID.min = df.ROW.2010$country[df.ROW.2010$yld == min(df.ROW.2010$yld)]
ID.min

ID.max = df.ROW.2010$country[df.ROW.2010$yld == max(df.ROW.2010$yld)]
ID.max

text(df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.min], df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.min]+.2, labels=ID.min, cex= .8, pos=4, offset = .2)

text(df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.max], df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.max]+.2, labels=ID.max, cex= .8, pos=4, offset = .2)
```

# Sustainable Quality

```{r}
df.sust <- data.frame(Country=df.EU.2010$country)

df.sust$Quality <- round(((df.EU.2010$hale - df.EU.1990$hale) / (df.EU.2010$yld - df.EU.1990$yld)) * (df.EU.1990$yld / df.EU.1990$hale), 2)

df.sust$Cost <- round(((df.EU.2010$the - df.EU.1990$the) / (df.EU.2010$yld - df.EU.1990$yld)) * (df.EU.1990$yld / df.EU.1990$the), 2)

df.sust$SustValue <-  round((df.sust$Quality / df.sust$Cost * 100), 1)

check <- ((df.EU.2010$hale - df.EU.1990$hale) / (df.EU.2010$the - df.EU.1990$the)) * (df.EU.1990$the / df.EU.1990$hale)

check - df.sust$SustValue < 0.0001

ID.EU <- df.sust$Country[df.sust$SustValue == max(df.sust$SustValue)]
ID.EU

print(df.sust, row.names = F)

attach(df.sust)

hist(SustValue,  main="Histogram of Sustainable Value", xlab="Sustainable Value x 100", prob=TRUE, col="skyblue", breaks=c(0, seq(.5,8,.5)), xlim=c(0, 8), ylim=c(0, .5), border="black", las=1, axes=F)
axis(1, at=0:8)
axis(2)
lines(density(SustValue), col="blue", lwd=2) 
lines(density(SustValue, adjust=2), lty="dotted", col="black", lwd=2)
abline(v=mean(SustValue), col="red", lwd=1)
abline(v=median(SustValue), col="black", lty=1, lwd=1)
legend(.5, .5, c("mean","median"), col=c("red", "black"), bty="n", y.intersp=1.5, lty=c(1,1), cex = 1, lwd=1)

qqnorm(SustValue, main="Q-Q Plot of Sustainable Value")
qqline(SustValue, col="red", lwd = 1)

# p-plot: you should observe a good fit of the straight line
probplot(SustValue, qdist=qnorm)

summary(SustValue)
density(SustValue)

```
